ccs.graph

Class Realization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccs.graph.Realization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Realization
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a realization, that is, the point coordinates for each vertex, of a LinkageGraph.
    Author:
    doris
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
